titles.title: A bill to provide that the special service obligations of a licensee under section 331(a) of the Communications Act of 1934 shall continue to apply even if the licensee changes from a very high frequency station to an ultra high frequency station.
Section 331 Obligation Clarification Act
Section 331 Obligation Clarification Act
Section 331 Obligation Clarification Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Section 331 Obligation Clarification Act
This bill applies the special service obligations of licensees of very high frequency commercial television broadcast stations to licensees who change to ultra high frequency commercial television broadcast stations.
